verses.verse: From whence<WG4159> come wars<WG4171> and<WG2532> fightings<WG3163> among<WG1722> you?<WG5213> come they not<WG3756> hence,<WG1782> even of<WG1537> your<WG5216> lusts<WG2237> that war<WG4754> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> members?<WG3196>

Ye lust,<WG1937> and<WG2532> have<WG2192> not:<WG3756> ye kill,<WG5407> and<WG2532> desire to have,<WG2206> and<WG2532> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> obtain:<WG2013> ye fight<WG3164> and<WG2532> war,<WG4170> yet<WG1161> ye have<WG2192> not,<WG3756> because ye<WG5209> ask<WG154> not.<WG3361>
Ye ask,<WG154> and<WG2532> receive<WG2983> not,<WG3756> because<WG1360> ye ask<WG154> amiss,<WG2560> that<WG2443> ye may consume<WG1159> it upon<WG1722> your<WG5216> lusts.<WG2237>

Ye adulterers<WG3432> and<WG2532> adulteresses,<WG3428> know<WG1492> ye not<WG3756> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> friendship<WG5373> of the<WG3588> world<WG2889> is<WG2076> enmity<WG2189> with God?<WG2316> whosoever<WG3739> <WG302> therefore<WG3767> will<WG1014> be<WG1511> a friend<WG5384> of the<WG3588> world<WG2889> is<WG2525> the enemy<WG2190> of God.<WG2316>

Do ye<WG2228> think<WG1380> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> Scripture<WG1124> saith<WG3004> in vain,<WG2761> The<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> that<WG3739> dwelleth<WG2730> in<WG1722> us<WG2254> lusteth<WG1971> to<WG4314> envy?<WG5355>

But <WG1161> he giveth<WG1325> more<WG3187> grace.<WG5485> Wherefore<WG1352> he saith,<WG3004> God<WG2316> resisteth<WG498> the proud,<WG5244> but<WG1161> giveth<WG1325> grace<WG5485> unto the humble.<WG5011>
Submit <WG5293> yourselves therefore<WG3767> to God.<WG2316> Resist<WG436> the<WG3588> devil,<WG1228> and<WG2532> he will flee<WG5343> from<WG575> you.<WG5216>

Draw nigh<WG1448> to God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> he will draw nigh<WG1448> to you.<WG5213> Cleanse<WG2511> your hands,<WG5495> ye sinners;<WG268> and<WG2532> purify<WG48> your hearts,<WG2588> ye double minded.<WG1374>

Be afflicted,<WG5003> and<WG2532> mourn,<WG3996> and<WG2532> weep:<WG2799> let your<WG5216> laughter<WG1071> be turned<WG3344> to<WG1519> mourning,<WG3997> and<WG2532> your joy<WG5479> to<WG1519> heaviness.<WG2726>
Humble yourselves<WG5013> in the sight<WG1799> of the<WG3588> Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> he shall lift you up.<WG5312> <WG5209>

Speak not evil<WG2635> <WG3361> one of another,<WG240> brethren.<WG80> He that speaketh evil<WG2635> of his brother,<WG80> and<WG2532> judgeth<WG2919> his<WG848> brother,<WG80> speaketh evil<WG2635> of the law,<WG3551> and<WG2532> judgeth<WG2919> the law:<WG3551> but<WG1161> if<WG1487> thou judge<WG2919> the law,<WG3551> thou art<WG1488> not<WG3756> a doer<WG4163> of the law,<WG3551> but<WG235> a judge.<WG2923>
There is<WG2076> one<WG1520> lawgiver,<WG3550> who is able<WG1410> to save<WG4982> and<WG2532> to destroy:<WG622> who<WG5101> art<WG1488> thou<WG4771> that<WG3739> judgest<WG2919> another?<WG2087>

Go to<WG33> now,<WG3568> ye that say,<WG3004> Today<WG4594> or<WG2532> tomorrow<WG839> we will go<WG4198> into<WG1519> such<WG3592> a city,<WG4172> and<WG2532> continue<WG4160> there<WG1563> a<WG1520> year,<WG1763> and<WG2532> buy and sell,<WG1710> and<WG2532> get gain: <WG2770>

Whereas <WG3748> ye know<WG1987> not<WG3756> what<WG3588> shall be on the<WG3588> morrow.<WG839> For<WG1063> what<WG4169> is your<WG5216> life?<WG2222> It is<WG2076> even<WG1063> a vapor,<WG822> that appeareth<WG5316> for<WG4314> a little time,<WG3641> and<WG1161> then<WG1899> vanisheth away.<WG853>
For <WG473> that ye<WG5209> ought to say,<WG3004> If<WG1437> the<WG3588> Lord<WG2962> will,<WG2309> we shall<WG2532> live,<WG2198> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> this,<WG5124> or<WG2228> that.<WG1565>
But <WG1161> now<WG3568> ye rejoice<WG2744> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> boastings:<WG212> all<WG3956> such<WG5108> rejoicing<WG2746> is<WG2076> evil.<WG4190>
Therefore <WG3767> to him that knoweth<WG1492> to do<WG4160> good,<WG2570> and<WG2532> doeth<WG4160> it not,<WG3361> to him<WG846> it is<WG2076> sin.<WG266>
